name: Mini Vanilla Vibezzz - Whipped Argan Oil Refillable Firming Body Butter
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Body Lotions & Body Oils
about: What it is: An air-whipped full-body moisturizer with argan oil that rapidly soaks in, delivering juicy firmness, intense hydration, and an all-over glow.Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy.Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes: Vanilla Bean & Juniper BerriesFragrance Description: In this warm amber blend, the gourmand essence of creamy Madagascan vanilla flirts with sparkling bergamot against a backdrop of earthy cedar.About the Fragrance: As fragrance purists and planet lovers, Josie Maran uses only 100% plant-based essences: real fruits, nuts, woods, and plants. Because nothing beats the real thing..Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamin E..- Avocado Oil: Known to improve the look of skin elasticity and firmness, rich in antioxidants..- Shea Butter: Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...What Else You Need to Know: This body butter absorbs rapidly on dry skin for a velvety-soft and firming finish that lasts all day. Responsibly sourced argan is whipped to creamy perfection with 100 percent plant-based fragrances in a lightweight yet rich formula. With the refill system, top up your amber glass jar and reuse forever...Research Results: In a consumer perception survey of 39 people using the body butter on their thighs, stomach, and arms:.- 100% agreed their skin felt deeply hydrated and moisturized throughout the day after one use.- 97% agreed that the product provided an instant glow after one use.- 97% saw a noticeable improvement in firmness and tone after 2 weeks.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Argan Oil:  An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and Vitamin E..-Avocado Oil:  Known to improve skin elasticity and firmness; rich in antioxidants..-Shea Butter:  Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...Aqua (Water)**, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil**, Glyceryl Stearate**, Glycerin**, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter**, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyl Dimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Fragrance (Parfum)**, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract**, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract**, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract**, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract**, Squalane**, Beta-Carotene**, Citric Acid**, Tocopherol**, Allantoin**, Panthenol**, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate**, Polysorbate-60**, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol**, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool.  ..*Organic..**Naturally Derived...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage generously into skin for an instant moisture boost..Josieu2019s tip:.-For best results, use after showering when pores are open and receptive to the whipped, velvety goodness....Recycling Instructions:.-Remove the cap of the jar, remove red liner from inside the cap, rinse both cap and jar thoroughly, and drop the separated jar and cap in your at-home recycling bin..-Liner can be recycled through TerraCycle. Flatten product box and drop in your at-home recycling bin..-Recycle pouch through TerraCycle....Refill Product Instructions:.-With the refill pouches, you can top up your gorgeous amber glass jar and reuse it forever. Each pouch refills the 6 oz. jar 2.25 times.

reviews.review_title: The scent reminds me of lemon sandwich cookies
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this smells amazing. I received it as a sample and Iu2019m purchasing it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t really care for it the smell is very light to no smell itu2019s very soft on the skin but I wouldnu2019t repurchase

reviews.review_title: Perfect on the go moisturizing lotion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells so good and is the perfect thickness. very great for your purse and on the go, and the packaging is completely leak proof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: smelled this in store from the container and it smelled nice but i got the refill and it has no vanilla scent whatsoever? confused.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it literally smells like plastic. the name is misleading, not that hard to make a vanilla scent, itu2019s been done plenty of times. but the lotion itself does leave the skin feeling moisturized. i was looking forward to this, highly disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 hands down one of the best body cremes I have used. It says its a butter but its a very silky creme consistency The formula is AMAZING the scent is veryyy light but I don't mind it because it's just that good! GET IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great, hydrating, pleasant but not overpowering scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s moisturizing. But I donu2019t smell vanilla nor do I think the ice cream picture depicts the scent. Itu2019s SUPER light weight and almost floral. Not the least bit sweet. I honestly have a hard time smelling it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am very happy with this product, my skin is softer and I love the vanilla aroma u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Whereu2019s the scentu2026..? Literally smells like nothing but plain lotion. Not sure if itu2019s just the refillable pouch (never had the jar) but this was pretty misleading.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lotion it keeps my hands moist and soft. If you arenu2019t a fan of a lotion that leaves your hands a tad bit greasy this might not be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is light and my skin feels really soft. If you're a person that would buy this because it's scent, DO NOT BUY IT. It smells suuuuper light and I couldn't really tell what I was smelling. It kinda dissapointed me but my skin felt lowk softer ud83dude1b

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was influenced by the picture on the package. There is no vanilla scent, not even a light one. I feel mislead. That being said, the formula is nice and not overly thick or greasy how I imagine many body butters are.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best body butter ever! I was skeptical about getting it because of some of the reviews about the smell. Iu2019m so glad I gave it a chance. I absolutely love the smell. Itu2019s very light  but I love it. And the consistency is chefu2019s kiss  I have dry skin and this cream is very hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is amazing! It smells like yogurt and has the same texture as it. I love how smooth and non greasy it made my skin feel. Worth mentioning: I use an oil after the shower, while the skin is wet, then apple my body lotion after I dry.

reviews.review_title: bring back the old formula and scents!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a big fan of Josie Maran's body butters. they were so moisturizing but could be greasy if too much was used. they got rid of my KP and made my skin so smooth. there wasn't one scent that was bad. then they got reformulated. the new body butter feels moisturizing at first but it doesnt last. all of the scents smell bad to me. I can't describe it but it makes me think of hippies lol. the only change I liked is the packaging. I dont like tub moisturizers and this one let's you choose whether you want the refill or tub.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I put a little on my hands and it gave me a full body rash ud83dude14 I love the scent but yeah

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Body butter is good, but I wanted the scent to be a bit more stronger.  Itu2019s very faint and doesnu2019t even last for more than minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this, the smell isnu2019t very strong or very vanilla but still a pleasant smell, itu2019s like a mixture of a light vanilla scent and what unscented lotion smells like. It hydrates well and doesnu2019t leave a sticky residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is wonderful. The smell is fantastic, however a little sweet for me! I wish it had more of a vanilla undertone and less sweet! Other than that, this moisturizer is great! I will continue to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Much thicker then I excepted and the smell is a little artificial but short lasting :( container and packaging  was cool tho

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting this to smell like vanilla ice cream. I didnu2019t get even a hint of vanilla scent in this lotion. Also, I spot tested this on my hand and thank god I did because I broke out in hives. Not for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect size to take with you on the go! It smells great and really does have that light but creamy whipped texture to hydrate without leaving your skin feeling too greasy like some others!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this body butter!  Some body butters are far too thick and sticky, but the Josie Maran body butter has a light, whipped formula and sinks in quickly.I also love the warm vanilla scent.  After using this product, my skin feels wonderfully soft.  This is a product that I would recommend and repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in store during the Fall Sale.  Opened it today November 18th.  Smelled, no Vanilla at all.  I tried and on my hands.  It has an odd Old Odor.  I tend to think it was possibly bad when I purchased it recently.  I previously purchased the Body Butter and it is Great.  This scrub I am tossing in the Trash.  There needs to be an expiration date on her products since they lean towards Natural.  I certainly know even the Shelf Life of Natural Products not opened can turn BAD.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You cannot beat the Josie Maran Whipped Argan Body Butters. They provide an intense amount of hydration to the skin and smell incredible! I love the new refills as they are the perfect size for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the vanilla scent of this whipped lotion. It left my skin feeling so soft and the fragrance lasted for hours. The application was easy, the product dried to the touch very quickly and didnu2019t leave my skin feeling sticky or anything. It has a nice smooth texture. The packaging was nice. It was easy to get every drop out of it since it was soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these body butters! They feature refillable packaging which I love having as a sustainable option. The refillable packaging is easy to refill and lightweight. The cream itself has a thicker more creamy consistency, so I find that itu2019s super nourishing for my skin, especially in these dryer months. My skin soaks it all up and it leaves me looking supple and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a warm, slightly sweet, and earthy fragrance with notes of fig, sandalwood, and a touch of floral undertones. The scent is not overpowering but lingers lightly on the skin throughout the day. It's sophisticated and a little exotic, making it a nice alternative to typical fruity or floral body butter scents. Fans of a more complex fragrance will appreciate how the fig balances with the woody notes for a unique, slightly musky, but fresh experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the smell is awful but the butter is so hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not really sure if Iu2019m anosmic to this, but I donu2019t smell any vanilla. If anything it a very light fresh fragrance to me. If youu2019re looking for something that packs a punch in the fragrance dept, this isnu2019t it. I will however still give it 5 stars because it is extremely moisturizing and it definitely revitalized my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample cause I wanted to give it shot, the picture made the product really stand out and since I'm huge vanilla fan I wanted to give it go. Well, sadly it wasn't what I was expecting. It honestly doesn't have much of scent at all, maybe slight juniper scent but even that is hardly there and the vanilla is so weak is basically non existent. It just smells like regular unscented lotion, they really need to up the fragrance in this and make the vanilla sweeter. It's a good for moisturizing/layering if you just want somethig to pair perfume with but other than that there's other vanilla scents lotions and body butters that are better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smelled so amazing. I loved the consistency of the product as well as how easy it was to use. It melted into my skin and make my legs feel super soft. I like the way it felt as well! I canu2019t wait to buy it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this since I'm such a vanilla-scent lover. I received a sample of this and found this to be a great moisturizer. The scent however .... straight up plastic in my opinion. Def recommend trying a free sample first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so amazing! I love the way it feels on my skin even more though! Itu2019s not greasy, but it keeps my skin soft and glowing. It absorbs super fast. Plus I smell like soft serve! Whatu2019s not to love?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this lotion!! It would make a great stocking stuffer this christmas. The packaging is cute, trendy, and aesthetically pleasing. The smell is to die for! I think every girl would like it. Itu2019s sweet but not overbearing. A warm, cozy scent. And lastly, the lotion itself is great quality. The perfect thickness to moisturize well but not feel heavy on the skin. Leaves my skin supple and soft! Couldnt recommend this more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve always heard about josie maranu2019s products and was soo excited to finally try one out. The body butter is smooth and blends in seamlessly. It doesnu2019t leave a greasy feel and has a wonderful light vanilla aroma.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Josie Maran Mini Whipped Argan Oil Body Butter in Vanilla Vibezzz is a delightful treat for your skin. This body butter has a luxuriously creamy texture that feels incredibly rich yet lightweight, gliding on effortlessly. The vanilla fragrance is warm and inviting without being overpowering, making it a perfect companion for cozy days or nights.  The packaging is both chic and practicalu2014small enough to toss in your bag for on-the-go hydration but still elegant enough to display on your vanity. The whipped formula absorbs quickly, leaving no greasy residue behind, which I appreciate for everyday use. My skin felt instantly hydrated and soft, with a noticeable glow that lasted throughout the day.  After applying, my skin looked visibly smoother and felt nourished. This body butter has become a staple in my routine, providing a perfect balance of hydration and a delightful scent that lifts my spirits. Overall, it's a lovely indulgence that delivers on both performance and sensory experience.

Vanilla is such a good scent and this one is a good version of it. Would highly recommend trying this. Love the texture with the srgan oil. It smells so good and comes in a mini to try. Everyone should try it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is really nice when first applied - the initial smell is JUST like a vanilla waffle cone!! The cream itself is super hydrating also. Unfortunately within minutes I start to smell something else..... almost Woody?? I don't like it whatever it is, sadly.

reviews.review_title: Amazing vanilla scent!!! Perfect travel size!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Josie Maran mini whipped body butter is the perfect size to carry in your bag, and even in the car. The scent is amazing, smells like vanilla and ice cream. Kept me moisturized all day long, didnu2019t transfer onto clothes and the scent also lasted all day long. This is the perfect gift for Christmas and the size will fit into Christmas stockings! Highly recommended this guys, trust me!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite body lotion. It smells good and I love the packaging. The travel size is perfect to toss in my bag or for vacations. The vanilla scent is so lovely too and a classic that pairs well with my perfume collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is just too beautiful! This brand truly does have one of the best lotions out there for my skin type. It actually does nourish my skin so deeply and repairs my skin barrier. I can tell due to how soft and smooth my skin is after use. Fave!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the consistency of the body butter, but tk my surprise I didnu2019t like this scent. It smells like a spoiled milk. Didnu2019t do much for the skin, my skin didnu2019t feel nourished. I like the traditional vanilla butter but not this Vanilla vibezz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The brand described the smell of the cream accurately, it reminds me of a cone from my childhood. Have you seen this packaging? It is so beautiful and convenient even for a small bag. The body is so pleasant to the touch, as if you were touching velvet. I use it after a shower. I definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product in exchange for an honest review. Super surprised by this lotion in the best way possible! Iu2019m not usually a vanilla girl but wanted to try it out and when it came I thought it was going to be super vanilla scented since the packaging was a bit yellowish. But to my surprise itu2019s actually the perfect amount of vanilla. Not too strong but itu2019s there. On the thicker side, but super hydrating which I need especially in the winter months ahead. Itu2019s easy to use with the squeeze tube as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: if you're looking for glowy skin, get this vanilla girlie, get this.  it smells like vanilla yogurt, makes your skin glow and feel soft, and if you want to take it an extra notch, pair with a floral scent like Givenchy irresistible or a milky, woody scent like milk expressive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how amazing this body butter smells! It smells so much like a vanilla ice cream cone. Itu2019s very rich and hydrating, and a little goes a long way! I really like the travel size packets because I can pack them in my carry on bag without having to worry.

I love how amazing this body butter smells! Itu2019s very rich and hydrating, and a little goes a long way! I love the travel size packets because I can pack them in my carry on bag and they donu2019t take up much space!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula of this body butteru2014 it absorbs quickly into the skin and leaves the skin feeling deeply moisturized but (very importantly) not greasy or thick on the skin. The scent has the warm vanilla sweetness but is very subtle, which I prefer. The packaging of the travel size makes it really easy for travel as it fits into the palm of your hand and can be molded or squeezed to fit small spaces. I can see this becoming a staple of my skin care.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the pouch packaging- perfect for refills or travel. Doesnu2019t make a mess when squeezed and cap seals tightly. Gorgeous light vanilla scent. Has a rich and creamy texture. Applies beautifully with no tugging. Absorbs super fast and completely. No greasy or sticky feel. Leaves skin soft and supple with a healthy glow. Overall, this is a dream for my dry skin and love the cozy vanilla vibes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Josie Marian mini whipped argan oil body butter is amazing. The smell reminds me of ice cream on a warm summer day. The lotion is thick but soaks in quickly to your skin. A small amount goes a long way.  The mini packaging is great to carry in your luggage for your travels. I hope they have gift sets with this included. I hope to try more scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this body butter. A little goes a lo my way. Itu2019s super rich and hydrating but doesnu2019t make my skin feel greasy. The vanilla scent is so delicious as well. I just wish it wasnu2019t so expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This body butter makes my skin feel so soft and keeps me hydrated the entire day. It also has a very calming vanilla scent, and I love that a little goes a long way. These mini pouches are also convenient to travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this Josie Marian Mini whipped body butter and I was super excited to try this! Iu2019ve seen it all over social media and itu2019s definitely worth the hype. This made my skin feel super soft but this product also smells amazing. This would be perfect for a stocking stuffer for the holidays! I definitely recommend trying this out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Josie Maran Mini Whipped Argan Oil Body Butter in Vanilla Vibezzz is such a treat! The texture is luxuriously creamy and absorbs beautifully into the skin without any greasy residue. It leaves my skin feeling deeply nourished and soft for hours, which I love. The scent is a warm, inviting vanilla that feels cozy and not overpowering:perfect for everyday wear or layering with other fragrances. Itu2019s a great size for on-the-go, too. If youu2019re a fan of vanilla scents and hydrating body butters, this one is a must-try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m absolutely in love with this lotion! Such a nice subtle vanilla smell but still gives me beautiful hydrated skin! I love the mini size to throw in my purse for touch ups during the day! Especially since itu2019s winter my skin has been begging for hydration!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying I do not write reviews and I don't care about this brand. I actually HATE them because they've created the most delicious vanilla scent in this butter. I am NOT typically a vanilla scent girly - I find them incredibly basic and flat. NOT THIS ONE. The juniper berries and violet combined with the vanilla and cedar base notes make my eyes wanna roll back in my head. I see reviews complaining the smell is not great or not vanilla. Remember to take these with a grain of salt, as not everyone will have the same olfactory experience as you. I highly encourage you to smell this in store and buy the small travel size if you're unsure. Once I figure out which perfume to layer this with to make the smell last longer, IT'S SOOOOOOOOOO OVER!!!  Oh yeah, it's moisturizing and will leave a faint glow (no shimmer, just very emollient). Don't use in places you're prone to breaking out (e.g. back, butt). Lastly, I will never buy full size even though I am capable because that is egregious, unnecessary, and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, super hydrating and really nice consistency. However next time I will be repurchasing the unscented version because this scent smells like vanilla greek yogurt on me (not in a good way).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted a luxurious moisturizer to use on my legs after my weekly scrub and shave, and this one works wonders. I'm a total vanilla girlie and it's perfect to lock in all my scents after and keep me smooth. I have to stop myself from slathering my whole body in it because i can't afford it lol

reviews.review_title: Great hydration, not so great scent.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The body butter is soooo hydrating. I'm sure the Argan oil helps with that. My only issue is I can't stand the smell of the vanilla vibez one. I can't put my finger on what it smells like, but definitely not vanilla. I will probably stick with the unscented going forward because I didn't like how any of the scented ones smelled. They all just smell a bit off to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so hydration and long lasting, I feel like a glowing goddess the days I use this product. I would also say that it is very long lasting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: very good and smells amazing great to put in your purse

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: cute packaging, I didn't realize this was the refill apon buying  but i like the feel and look of this mini size, also feels nice applying. Cons: no smell really, like a faint FAINT smell of vanilla tonka bean but barley. you smell nothing after rubbing it in

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging and consistency, but the smell is nothing like any vanilla I have smelled, I will have to mix it with my Nest Vanilla Oil in order to use, I won't be purchasing again, smells like vitamins.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this lotion! I'm on my fourth tub of it. It's super moisturizing, and I love the updated packaging. It smells amazing, and it's a plus that it is considered clean. Please don't change anything about this lotion!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this smell immediately.. *vanilla custard/vanilla wafer**, the formula is also very rich and velvety- keeps me moisturized all day. Only downside, is that the smell is undetectable after rubbing it in. I wish it radiated more since I purchased purely for the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not very hydrating, pretty greasy and smells like milk that has gone bad...For how much it costs for such a tiny sample, I expected better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and was itching to get the whole jar. I love that a little goes a long way. It's thick but not too oily or too dry. It smells divine! It really is a perfect blend of sweet vanilla and herbal juniper. I wish it was a perfume. The only reason it doesn't get a 5 star is because for me the lotion can take quite a while to soak in, so it's not perfect, but it's pretty close.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG, this is A M A Z I N G! Hands down the best body butter I have ever tried. The scent is divine! My skin is soo supple and delicious after I use it and smells divine and rich. I cannot get enough of it. A perfect summer body butter. I love that it is in a glass jar. It looks lux.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I anticipated a stronger, sweeter vanilla fragrance in this body butter. Itu2019s offensively faint, especially for a nearly $30 mini. The moisture didnu2019t last longer than 10 mins and the scent lasted 10 seconds max.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this body butter. makes my skin very soft with too greasy.  I do miss the beautiful feminine old container that was brown with pretty mauve/pinky color lid. looked so pretty on my makeup dresser. would like to try newer products...hopefully she comes out with new products..makeup would be nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sweet smelling and think lotion.  Travel size to keep your skin subtle while traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very creamy and feels luxurious. A must have for my night time routine.

reviews.review_title: I need a perfume of this scent!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While this is decently moisturizing.. the smell is EVERYTHING! Josie Maran, Iu2019m going to need you to make this scent into a fragrance because I cannot get enough of this scent! Itu2019s so soft & delicious. Please make this into a perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product! I was a religious Sol de Janeiro 68 cream user, but this one is better for me. Scent is beautiful, I was worried because I don't like vanilla, but this is like a sugary cake vanilla, is thick and feels greasy at the beginning, however, I love that feeling after having a shower o taking a bath. Just love love love it.

reviews.review_title: Smells like a Krispy Kreme donut, non-greasy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a whim not too long ago, and it's an amazing product. I love warm scents like vanilla, caramel, coconut etc. This product smells like exactly like a Krispy Kreme donut to me and I love it! Also impressive is that while this product has argan oil in it, it doesn't stay greasy. After a few minutes my skin soaks it up and the oily feel completely goes away. It's pretty amazing. A staple for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my skin silky soft and firm while adding a glow. If you have a tan, it enhances it.

reviews.review_title: I think this one is perfect for the fall
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like the apple sugar and cinnamon donuts from the apple orchard during the fall season (it doesnu2019t smell like apples, just like sugary doughnuts)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is so moisturizing and smells amazing. Definitely worth the buy

reviews.review_title: Amazing (just wish the scent was little stronger)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wish the scent was stronger, but it really does smell like melted ice cream. i always get compliments from my family and coworkers on how glowy my skin looks haha. itu2019s this stuff baby!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get rebranding and making more environmentally conscious products, but why change the formula and basically take away the scent. I returned mine. Smelt like absolutely nothing. Thank goodness I have 2 jars of the original. Highly disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice thick texture. Not as moisturizing as I thought and the smell is not so attractive. I can give half stars or I would.

reviews.review_title: Texture great / scent not so much
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wish the scent was better. The scents not the worst but smells almost sour. The lotion makes my skin feel soft and smooth and not greasy which is a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got for the first time because I was hearing a lot of good things about it. Very disappointed in finding out that it had an oily and sticky feel to the body butter. Didnu2019t smell that good after awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell and how it moisturizes my skin. My skin feels amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not gonna lie i read someone said this smelled like yogurt and theyre kinda right. On the other hand this mixed with a body oil smells divine and it does keep your skin moisturized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, like a toned down vanilla that is not overpowering. It layers well with vanilla body mist. Great at moisturizing and blending into skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: smells so heavenly. just like you would expect. 100 percent worth the money! I never get as many complements as i do when i use this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Feels and smells sooo good I got the vanilla perfect for Summer not too heavy and VERY moisturizing new staple RUN to get this !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is really yummy, itu2019s basically like soft serve but in body lotion form! Really nice smell, if you used the brand u201ccakeu201d from Sephora a long time ago it smells very similar to their milk  made hand cream . Very hydrating, perfect for summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing moisturizer, amazing scent. Smells just like vanilla soft serve ice cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the bohemian fig scent but this one smells just like the EOS vanilla cashmere imo which is a fraction of the price. Definitely moisturizing, but I would opt for another scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this buddy butter, moisturizing the skin, it leaves the skin juicy and shiny, it is not sticky, I use it to hydrate my feet and they no longer look dry. If you want to have your feet 100% hydrated, use this product and I love its smell, it's worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a deluxe size sample of this and I am so glad I didnu2019t waste my money. It has no scent except a faint play dough smell and it is sticky and never quite dries down. I donu2019t understand the hype. Threw it away after a few uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely smells divine and like youu2019d want to eat it, so worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t smell vanilla or juniper. This body butter is great for moisturizing my skin. I stay moisturized all day. Itu2019s not greasy or sticky. The scent is very very subtle. If you are looking for a great product to last all day without a scent then this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice formula, a little goes a long way and itu2019s very moisturizing and lasts. Scent is nice and subtle. Side note: the jar is so ugly, looks like some weird orange peanut butter or crusty old clearance bin candle

reviews.review_title: Scent changes, a bit sticky. good for travel.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great to throw in my bag, doesn't take up much space. It moisturizes but does have a tiny bit of a sticky feel. At first the scent smelled to me like Cabbage Patch dolls I had as a kid, then it smelled like vanilla a bit and sometimes I get a sweet soy sauce scent.... don't hate it, don't love it. I am interested in what other scents would smell like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed! NOT worth the money!  I was very excited to try this product because of the review and TIKTOK (of course). Firstly the size I purchased (400ml) did not come with a jar. Although I wasn't happy about this, I figured id buy the size that came with the jar as well.  However after smelling the product I'm confused as to where the vanilla smell is. It give a slight smell of something in the beginning but the smell immediately leaves once applied and smells really strange almost like oil or a weird yogourt. Im not sure how to describe it. I tried to cover it with Kayla vanilla which I purchased to layer with the vanilla body butter however that didn't work. I took a shower to wash the product off and immediately returned it that day. Im going to try smelling the other scents in store maybe this one was just off.  as for the hydration it does work. very oily so don't use much product but my skin did feel amazing if it wasn't for the awful smell I would keep it. However I'll be returning both the scrub and the butter immediately.  if you live near a Sephora go into store before purchasing, I don't recommend buy this product online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This body butter smells SO FREAKING AMAZING I personally love vanilla and thought I would give this one a try and Iu2019m glad I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had read that this smelled like vanilla yogurt and until I used it for the first time I didnu2019t believe it. It smells like I drenched myself in yogurt. I wanted it to smells like ice cream or a yummy vanilla scent but instead Iu2019m walking around smelling like my toddler threw her Activia yogurt at me and I didnu2019t have time to shower it off all day. On top of that itu2019s only so so for moisturizing. Not worth the price in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yummy! A very unexpected fruity vanilla..still sweet, but I didnu2019t expect how fruity it is. Feels very moisturizing too! The scent doesnu2019t last more then a hour on the skin though :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is incredibly yummy like french vanilla ice cream but in a more luxurious way. The scent gets better once the bottle is first opened and the product can breathe. Super long lasting hydration days later

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fell in love with this at first try in the store. They all smell good but I went with the vanilla because itu2019s such a light scent. Makes the texture of my skin is like butta!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought today after struggling with eczema and in general super dry itchy skin I have never been more impressed with the feeling of being moisturized it was instant relief. It also literally smells like melted vanilla ice cream

reviews.review_title: Moisturizing and it smells pretty good!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this with my own money, first of all.  Secondly, I get a pretty strong ice cream sweet smell. I donu2019t get yogurt, and I donu2019t think itu2019s faint. I donu2019t know, maybe I got a good batch? And itu2019s luxurious, making my tattoos pop!

reviews.review_title: Glowing skin, non greasy, long-lasting moisture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like vanilla yogurt so I can understand why the scent doesnu2019t work for some people. That said, if you like creamy, clean scents, I think this might work for you. The actual performance of the product is 10/10.

reviews.review_title: Is the vanilla in the room with us?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Oku2026I shouldu2019ve known better. Whenever all the influencer girlies are hyping something up, it never gives what itu2019s supposed to. This was disappointing. In terms of moisture, itu2019s ok, but I am a Fenty Butta Drop girl, this was just ok. The smell thoughu2026does it have a smell?? Where is the canilla? Where are the vibes?  I donu2019t get it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way and I really like the smell. It really does smell like ice cream, so if youu2019re not a fan of scents that are kinda saccharine youu2019d probably not like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: feels so luxurious when I apply it, the smell is so good, it's sweet but not obnoxious. I have really dry skin and it's very moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hi I am a Sephora beauty insider community ambassador and this is my authentic review. I do love the refill options on these. The scent is lovely. It absorbs so quickly and it makes my skin feel soft and moisturized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Josie Maran products but this one was a miss for me. The smell is pleasant but I don't get vanilla at all - just juniper, which isn't bad but definitely not what I was expecting. The formula itself is not the best IMO. Every time I've used it on my legs, it causes me to itch. I'll use the remainder as a hand cream but if you have sensitive skin, maybe avoid this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s not giving vanilla but it is good product to do use

reviews.review_title: If you like subtle, this is the perfect vanilla!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the scent of this one! As someone in their 40s, I donu2019t enjoy overpowering & sickly sweet gourmand scents. However I do like vanilla and this is the perfect adult version. Iu2019ll definitely repurchase this!

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s not giving Vanilla, but at least Iu2019m not ashy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Three stars for the moisture factor, very disappointed with the scent. I honestly donu2019t know what it is giving to even describe the smell, but one thing itu2019s not giving is gourmand or vanilla This is what happens when you let the influencer girlies hype a product up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing but the scent was a bit off-putting. It smells more like a tangy yogurt than vanilla. I intend to try a different scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for a few days, unfortunately it wasnu2019t as good as it looked. Itu2019s an average body butter at best but the reason why I gave it two stars was because it wasnu2019t as hydrating as I thought and as was advertised. It was also pretty greasy. Honestly, I think there are more affordable and more hydrating body butters out there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Their stuff is really good, but reducing the amount of the product for 2oz but still charge the same price? Yeah thatu2019s not so worth it

reviews.review_title: Moisturizing but Not Quiet the Vanilla I Expected
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try out Vanilla Vibezz. While it does deliver on moisturization, I couldn't help but feel a bit disappointed by the scent. Instead of the anticipated sweet vanilla, it leans towards a subtle sweetness that oddly reminds me of cheesecake. It's not what I expected, and though the scent may be overhyped, its hydrating qualities make it worth a repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 2oz less for the exact same product and the same price... It is a great product but no improvements have been made to it,  vanilla scent is still lacking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like hostess powdered mini donuts but subtle. itu2019s such a nostalgic, milky, soft, sweet scent, itu2019s thick, shiny on the skin, and moisturizing, but not greasy at all. Absorbs pretty quick for the consistency. love        I love it.            and expecting a jar with this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought a mini one to start cause I've never used their products before. I sniffed all the scents in-store and the Topless Tangerine was actually the best imo! But I went with this one cause I loveee vanilla scents - it's honestly super faint though and not vanilla, kinda sweet smelling? The product is creamy but absorbs superbly; will most likely repurchase with a different scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: despite the reviews of the scent i personally love it, itu2019s definitely not a super in your face vanilla but more so a light, sweet scent! i donu2019t find it super greasy bc i live in a dry climate! overall 8/10

reviews.review_title: Went through tub now onto the refill
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute love. This leaves you sooo glowing and I love the smell itu2019s not a sickly vanilla but more natural if that makes sense. Like vanilla yogurt in the best way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The cream feels really nice but I canu2019t get over the smell, makes me sick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 2oz less for the exact same product and the same price... It is a great product but no improvements have been made to it,  vanilla scent is still lacking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like hostess powdered mini donuts but subtle. itu2019s such a nostalgic, milky, soft, sweet scent, itu2019s thick, shiny on the skin, and moisturizing, but not greasy at all. Absorbs pretty quick for the consistency. love        I love it.            and expecting a jar with this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought a mini one to start cause I've never used their products before. I sniffed all the scents in-store and the Topless Tangerine was actually the best imo! But I went with this one cause I loveee vanilla scents - it's honestly super faint though and not vanilla, kinda sweet smelling? The product is creamy but absorbs superbly; will most likely repurchase with a different scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: despite the reviews of the scent i personally love it, itu2019s definitely not a super in your face vanilla but more so a light, sweet scent! i donu2019t find it super greasy bc i live in a dry climate! overall 8/10

reviews.review_title: Went through tub now onto the refill
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute love. This leaves you sooo glowing and I love the smell itu2019s not a sickly vanilla but more natural if that makes sense. Like vanilla yogurt in the best way
